skinnerbox.name: Skinnerbox
skinnerbox.description: A box with a small rat that periodically generates satisfaction by clicking a button.

gup.name: Gup
gup.description: A small cat that generates satisfaction by purring.

monkey.name: Monkey
monkey.complexDescription: This monkey generates satisfaction at random when it completes one of it's great works.

rpg.name: RPG
rpg.complexDescription: Satisfaction gained fluctuates in a sinewave because of player uptime.
